summary: Completed testing of authentic scarcity messaging implementation - removed fake waitlist counter and replaced with 'Limited Spaces Available • Join Cohort 1 Now' messaging
passed_tests: Backend /api/health returns real subscriber count without artificial inflation (BASE_SUBSCRIBER_COUNT = 0)
Backend /api/waitlist/count returns real count only (no fake inflation)
Hero section displays 'Limited Spaces Available • Join Cohort 1 Now' badge with Sparkles icon
Email signup form works correctly and shows success toast
No fake counter numbers (228+) visible in UI
Scarcity messaging uses authentic language instead of inflated numbers
